message: Hooray! You completed your very first trip to the market!
Amazing! You supported the Farmers Market again!
Third times the charm! Next time, try checking out a vendor you've never explored before!
Yay! Now you're shopping like a local.
Thanks for giving back to your community! Next time, why not introduce yourself to a vendor?
You're becoming a real Market maven! Keep up the support.
You are great at achieving your goals! Next time, take a friend and show them your favorite things!
Way to keep supporting your local Farmers Market!
Hooray for the Market! Next time, try a new food for the first time!
You're a Market regular! You're truly supporting your local community.
